description: Primes p == 1 (mod 4) where class number of Q(sqrt p) increases.
references: D. Shanks, Review of "K. E. Kloss et al., Class number of primes of the form 4n+1", Math. Comp., 23 (1969), 213-214.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: D. Shanks, Review of "K. E. Kloss et al., Class number of primes of the form 4n+1", Math. Comp., 23 (1969), 213-214. [Annotated scanned preprint of review]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
